meanings.sent1: She wore a skirtless outfit to the party.
meanings.sent2: The mannequin displayed a skirtless dress in the store window.
meanings.sent3: The skirtless mannequin caused a few chuckles among the shoppers.
meanings.sent4: Her closet was a skirtless wonderland, filled with pants and shorts.
meanings.sent5: The skirtless mannequin stood out among the traditionally dressed ones.

meanings.sent1: The skirtless mannequin caught the eye of the fashion designer.
meanings.sent2: The skirtless man looked out of place in the formal event.
meanings.sent3: The skirtless man caused a stir at the fancy party.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was skirtless, with only trousers and jeans.
meanings.sent5: The skirtless model strutted confidently down the runway.
